title: Which is better, Latin music or American music? Why? - Quora

response.answer_text: Why do you think it should be a competition? You know, I’m getting really fed up with all these which is better ‘this’ or ‘that’ type questions about music on Quora. I find them really boring and obnoxious. And after all, isn’t there a type of music called Latin-American music? I think you’ll find there is.

If you will ask about my opinion, I like Latin Music over American music. As they feel my soul with some kind of positive energy. If you wanna listen some, I suggest you to listen this ‘Bad Bunny Krippy Kush- Live Arrangement’ song by Prestige Sound.
